# MCP Configuration Files

This directory contains example configuration files for integrating mcp-wireshark with different tools.

## Claude Desktop

Copy the contents of `claude_desktop_config.json` to your Claude Desktop configuration file:

**macOS**: `~/Library/Application Support/Claude/claude_desktop_config.json`
**Windows**: `%APPDATA%\Claude\claude_desktop_config.json`
**Linux**: `~/.config/Claude/claude_desktop_config.json`

## VS Code

Copy the contents of `vscode_mcp_config.json` to your VS Code settings or create a `.vscode/settings.json` file in your project.

## Usage

After installation, the mcp-wireshark server will be available as a tool in your AI assistant, providing access to Wireshark functionality.
